DOC.brief_summary: In case cervical foraminal stenosis without central stenosis , several option ; anterior discectomy fusion ( ACDF ) , tubular retractor assist micro-foraminotomy ( MTPF ) posterior percutaneous cervical foraminotomy discectomy ( P-PECD ) . P-PECD modern technique RCT MTPF , although P-PECD show inferior result ACDF . Nowadays MTPF P-PECD minimally invasive surgical technique , comparative study . The primary object study compare radiological outcome ( segment angle ) MTPF P-PECD .
DOC.brief_title: Prospective Cohort Study Outcome After Minimally Invasive Posterior Cervical Spine Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: P-PECDs perform Seoul National University Hospital MTPFs perform Kyoung-Pook National University Hospital ACDF perform Seoul National University Bundang Hospital .
